abstract: Some American Express card members have raised questions about one of the five finalists in a contest to select a philanthropic idea that will win up to $5 million.
snippet: Some American Express card members have raised questions about one of the five finalists in a contest to select a philanthropic idea that will win up to $5 million.
lead_paragraph: One of the five finalists in a contest to select an idea that will win up to $5 million from the American Express Corporation is an effort to bring safe drinking water to children in poverty stricken countries.

headline.main: P.& G. Link in Amex Contest Raises Questions of Fairness
headline.print_headline: P.& G. Link in Amex Contest Raises Questions of Fairness

byline.original: By Stephanie Strom and Claudia H. Deutsch
